attributes.action: Ban the "Sheila's Wheel's" Insurance advert as it blatently discriminate's against men.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This advert needs to be removed from broadcast as it contravenes broadcasting discrimination laws & blatantly discriminates against men, if it was the other way round & discriminated against women there would be uproar.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
